creator: sf@sfritsch.de
text:
It doesn't pre-parse the require arguments, which is required by some providers.
Also, there is no logging that helps with debugging.

Apart from that, it would be nice if there was a way to create a single alias for several Require directives. But this may require a separate <AuthzAlias> container.

creator: rainer.jung@kippdata.de
text:
Applied to 2.4.x in r1359691.
released with 2.4.3.
Does not apply to 2.2.x.
